title: 2025 US Grand Prix: Qualifying start time and Saturday schedule
summary: Start time for qualifying ahead of the 2025 United States Grand Prix: Saturday schedule, including how to watch and stream

qa_pairs.question: What is the typical format of a Formula 1 qualifying session?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Three knockout rounds: Q1, Q2, and Q3.
wrong_options: Single lap time trial for all drivers.

qa_pairs.question: In which city is the United States Grand Prix traditionally held?
What is the main purpose of the qualifying session in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To determine the starting grid for the race.
wrong_options: To set the fastest lap for championship points.
To test car performance under race conditions.
